Pricing

The right price for you, whoever you are

Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Harum sequi unde repudiandae natus.

Everything you need to get started building the future of the web.

  • Unlimited sites

  • Unlimited collaborators

  • Unlimited builds

  • Community Support

Get started

Agency

$120 /mo

Stand out by making primo match your brand.

  • Custom domain

  • Whitelabeling

  • Premium support

  • Support primo development
